item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, September 7, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Keyhole – Forge own Windows Store licenses (39 points | 2 comments)
2. Hardware Acceleration of LLMs: A comprehensive survey and comparison (181 points | 33 comments)
3. Show HN: Wealthfolio: Private, open-source investment tracker (733 points | 216 comments)
4. Working Methods (Of a Historian) (5 points | 1 comment)
5. Malaysia started mandating ISPs to redirect DNS queries to local servers (150 points | 135 comments)
6. Natural Piezoelectric Effect May Build Gold Deposits (26 points | 6 comments)
7. QtCS2024: Compile once, Run everywhere (104 points | 19 comments)
8. Mapping 20k ships that sank during WW II (325 points | 147 comments)
9. Show HN: Using SQL's Turing completeness to build Tetris (243 points | 13 comments)
10. Show HN: Infinity – Realistic AI characters that can speak (341 points | 232 comments)
11. Pulsar, micro creative coding playground (75 points | 16 comments)
12. How to evaluate performance of LLM inference frameworks (15 points | 2 comments)
13. Creating an empty iterator of a certain type in Rust (2018) (22 points | 14 comments)
14. What's new in C++26 (part 1) (55 points | 43 comments)
15. Zen, CUDA, and Tensor Cores, Part I: The Silicon (51 points | 12 comments)

21. Oya, I've heard of mega-ROMs (84 points | 6 comments)

23. Minifying HTML for GPT-4o: Remove all the HTML tags (95 points | 30 comments)
24. Inertia.js – Build React, Vue, or Svelte apps with server-side routing (106 points | 29 comments)
25. Moondance: Experience the marvel that is night-blooming tobacco (31 points | 9 comments)
26. Tesorio Is Hiring a Senior GenAI Engineer and Django Engineer (100% Remote) ( | hide)
27. Boost your development environment with Ubuntu Multipass (42 points | 21 comments)
28. The heiress at Harvard who helped revolutionize murder investigations (10 points | 2 comments)
29. Goja: A Golang JavaScript Runtime (82 points | 29 comments)
30. Operating system threads are always going to be (more) expensive (42 points | 12 comments)
